long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An easy-to-use arXiv clipper to save arXiv articles into Notion.

FOLLOW THE SETUP INSTRUCTIONS BELOW.
https://github.com/denkiwakame/arxiv2notion?tab=readme-ov-file#%EF%B8%8F-setup

SAVE WITH ONE CLICK.
If you find a paper you wan to keep, just click the extension button and the bookmark icon.

MULTIPLE DATABASE SUPPORT.
You can switch between multiple Notion databases to save the paper as you need it.

INSTANT EDITING.
The extension opens the saved Notion article in another tab when you click the bookmark icon.
